short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to easily turn off the voice tone on karaoke songs from kool karaoke youtube channel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Kool karaoke tone off extension is used to turn off the voice(melody)tone on select karaoke music videos made by Kool karaoke Youtube channel. Simply click the Kool karaoke icon and press the left arrow to turn off the tone.The tone will remain off on all new videos reloaded on the same tab (if the karaoke song has the feature).To turn the tone on, simply click the right arrow.
